Silver Dove.title: blind mystic
Silver Dove.about:
first year over in a few days so i thought i'd put together something like this.
first acid wall is recorded 4/4/24 using synth, pedals and contact mic
second is recorded 24/2/24 (around then? probably over that whole month) + 21/4/24 using microcassette, pedals, laptop, harmonica guitar and voice (all at the same time for whatever reason), some other shit i dont remember, sounds like theres glockenspiel?
all parts made individually as detox, combined for catharsis <3
all dubbed to tape, maybe if someone wants the tape you can have it <3
appreciated all the love these things have got post hiatus, any email or anything i've gotten or any kind of love whatsoever has helped tremendously. <3 love you lots, hoping i can be active again during summer

laptop + pedals + bass amp + broken radio + white tea + thoughts or feelings
reminder yr special and are loved <3.

Silver Dove.title: Live in London
Silver Dove.about:
Wall noise object placed in the garden area of Gallery 46 in London, sound source is 2 speaker cones vibrating dry leaves and twigs w/ 2 contact mics and small pedal chain hidden under plastic tarp and ivy, recorded with Zoom H5, played at a high enough volume to be noticeable and a low enough volume to be ignored, maybe that is the intention for this album version too but it doesn't matter too much, this is just a kinda Live Document kinda thing. Also played drone stuff in the main performance room here;  foxmusicawesome.neocities.org/albums/soundblokebigband.
Dedicated to Arboreal, massive influence on everything, not just related to stuff I make, just everything.
arboreal.bandcamp.com
Thanks for any and all support over the last year for anything I've made, means a lot seeing support for things I've done even if it was a while ago. Much love. <3

Recorded 28/12/21 using guitar pedals, violin, acoustic guitar, field recordings, no input mixer, stage microphone and broken radio.

Silver Dove.title: volatile
Silver Dove.about:
recorded 02/08/22 all in one session
havent used a lot of my old equipment in a long time, so this is made using as much of it as i can.
any changes are made without human interference.

Silver Dove.title: voyeur
Silver Dove.about:
haha, was voreur for a bit, haha.
violin recorded 17/07/22 wall recorded 01/04/23 electric guitar recorded 03/04/23.
very pessimistic at the moment, this sounds very bright i think whch i am glad about.
fuck expensive equipment, shit pedals secondhand and discounted pickups, broken tape recorders and donated instruments, never had lessons...
